item.title: Tackling the plastics crisis via blended finance with Circulate Capital & the Circulate Initiative
item.description: When it comes to plastics, we’re in a real bind. We have yet to develop and scale attractive alternatives to the petroleum-based plastic products we all use every day, and the plastics industry drives well over a billion tons of greenhouse gasses, that’s roughly 4% of total global emissions and plastic-related emissions are on track to double by 2060. Meanwhile, a small fraction – we’re talking less than 10% – of plastics are recycled... Feed: https://feeds.captivate.fm/invested-in-climate/
